MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML6 postcode area of Airdrie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at Midnight to allow for safe digging and repairs on the underground cable fault on Saline Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:37pm on 6th January.
